website_summaries.verdict: TENS machine that gives you a great mix of versatility and power for pain relief.
pros: Adjust to meet your specific needs
Timer automatically shuts off the machine when your 10- to 60-minute session is completed
cons: Rechargeable battery may not hold full charge

customer_reviews.title: The battery is problematic
customer_reviews.text: Great design and easy to use. Like the programming, but the battery is a huge negative for me. This unit only lasts through maybe an hour of use which does not have to be continuous. I am finding that the battery discharges quickly even without use and takes much longer to charge than it can be actively used. If not for that, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great rehab device!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for rehabbing my shoulder. I get as good a result that I get at my rehab sessions on a larger device. I like to get to use this at home or in the office or wherever because it is so compact. I was worried about the battery life but I charge it about every couple of days and I use it 2-3 times a day. Well worth the money,
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: NEW iReliev TENS Unit + EMS
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as Christmas presents to family this year and I'm JEALOUS!!! This little unit is FANTASTIC! First off, it now can be recharged! Secondly, the front will now light up so you don't have to turn on lights to see what you're trying to do in the dark! I do wish the wireless ones were cheaper as that is really the best ones but they are just out of my price range. So, I'll keep doing these and maybe one of these days I'll be able to upgrade my son's and my iReliev to this model! Oh YEAH, they make you FEEL AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Southern gal

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. The pads tend to roll up on the ends. I use mine a lot so I go through the pads. Definitely would recommend. I use this for neurological itching and tingling. It provides much needed relief.
customer_reviews.author: donna b.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. It doesn't feel quite the same as what the chiropractor uses but I didnt spend big $$$ either. I have found many of my chiropractic visits were unnecessary! I use the tens unit and my pain is gone again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ruzicka

customer_reviews.title: Solid Device
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this device a few times but I found the following to be true: Easy to set up Interface is fairly user friendly Has significant power The multiple different settings are nice and allow you to configure it to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: WONT CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: The unit won’t charge. At first it didn’t stay charged long, now it won’t charge at all.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Sennett

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: We like the device - easy to use and understand, quick to recharge, multiple frequencies. Works excellent. Shipped on time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Works great to strengthen back muscles
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid golfer and have had issues with sore and strained back muscle. I bought this unit 3 weeks ago and have been using it 3-4 times a week. I have been using the EMS mode and the P6 and then the P5 program for 20 minutes. I started with an intensity setting of 15 and am now up to 22. After using the unit for about a week, my back isn’t sore and my muscle feel stronger. I also am hitting the driver about 10-15 yards farther. I’m thinking about using it on my abs. I would recommend this unit for anyone looking for and EMS unit as it is easy to use and has helped me
customer_reviews.author: SiddharthaNot

customer_reviews.title: A product worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from arthritis and fibroneualgia. This has provided relief such that I can avoid taking pain medication for the most part. It is easy to use and maintain. I take it with me everywhere. It is value priced and recommended by users.
customer_reviews.author: Torii Wehling

customer_reviews.title: Greatest investment you'll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest investment ever!!!!!! I have all sorts of pain, between muscular, nerve and joint pain. The other day I was at work and my knee was hurting so damn bad that I was sweating and doing everything I could to hold back tears. I put this on, using the EMS setting, and within 20 mins my pain level went from a 15 to a tolerable 7. I literally just left it on my knee all day and kept using it constantly and I was able to work without being in agonizing pain...... now if only I could put this on my jaw for all my clinching pain I'd be in love lol
customer_reviews.author: Michelle6787

customer_reviews.title: Great product -useless totebag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - using for knee arthritis. Only gave it a 4 because tote bag is not big enough to store unit, cords,charger(s) and both pad sizes. It needs to be about two inches bigger on the top and sides. I'll need to buy something extra that keeps whole unit together. Great instructions - did one run through and had it figured out. Good value with enough TENS and EMS options to handle all I need.
customer_reviews.author: LAT

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I first used a TENS unit at my physical therapy appointments, and ordered this unit for home use. I was waking up with back pain that made walking uncomfortable and caring for my twins very challenging. After 20 minutes of wearing this TENS unit each morning, my back feels loosened up and the pain has greatly diminished. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: GenevaRose

customer_reviews.title: Overrated, overpriced. You can do better and save money.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 4 of these devices. All of them had better battery life than 3-5 hours. At half the cost. I've had it less than a week, and know how to treat the electrode pads. It's already time to order new pads. For the money, that is ridiculous. If you decide to buy it, know you will need extra pads quickly. And Electrode Gel is a must. You can get by the terrible battery life. How expensive a device is has nothing to do with its quality. Do your homework before you buy. Yes it is highly rated. It should not be. I shouldnt have to spend more money on pads after less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: professorsnoop

customer_reviews.title: Takes a knocking but keeps on shocking
customer_reviews.text: I have accidentally jerked this thing out of my pocket, or have caught the wire on something so many times, yet it continues to provide great pain relief, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: R2Art

customer_reviews.title: Stops back pain. Don’t know about other pain yet.
customer_reviews.text: Love does the job with back pain. The wires get in the way a little . But it stops the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Definately worth the higher price point. (Rechargable!)
customer_reviews.text: 2 days with the device. They were using something similar during PT (shoulder sublocation) Really easy to use, simple interface, and surrisingly powerful. I am really glad I chose this unit. I put the pads in a quart size ziplock, and the rest in the tote. I love the fact that its rechargable.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Culbert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Useful for pain. Information for use in areas of pain was convenient and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Gralady59

customer_reviews.title: not that great
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to have something to use between Chiro appointments but this falls greatly short of what my Chiro office uses. I know they have professional muscle stimulator machines but I was hoping for more than what this unit delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Love being zapped !!
customer_reviews.text: This has been FANTASTIC so far (been using this unit for 4 days now) Life has taken a toll on the old body, from shoulders, bone spurs along spine, lower back to my knees I seem to stay in pain each and every day, over the years I have gone through 2 different tens units from a former chiropractor, so far this unit seems just as good, although I’ve never used a unit with the EMS feature, was something I was interested in which helped narrow my search down to this unit,
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several months for a chronic piriformis muscle issue. The battery has only been charged once since I started using it. I don't use it daily, but have used it multiple times for sometimes up to 60-80 minutes, using both modes -EMS and TENS. I was going to physical therapy and paying for every visit to use a EMS unit and stretching which seemed crazy. I can now do my own therapy at home, getting the same quality of muscle stimulation as I was in therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Louann Phares

customer_reviews.title: So far...so on the way to pain free!
customer_reviews.text: I got this due to a major accident in late 2018. After trying opioids, physical therapy and now pain management, my physiatrist prescribed one of these. I was really unsure if this would help. I have been bed ridden for months on and off from a broken pelvis and tbi/concussion. I literally cried because this device got down to the pain. Intensity 4 for both channels was plenty to give me pain relief. I am so hopeful after a few weeks of therapy I will be back to walking or at least working part time. Great product and 2 year warranty is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there
customer_reviews.text: Worth it. Read the other reviews that are much more extensive, as I did. No need to duplicate. They’re right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use if you simply follow the instructions line by line the first use. Great to have several pulse variations. Using only the TENS. Upgraded to this product for possible future of EMS. My issue has been debilitating muscle spasms in my back. The TENS, in combination with hot baths and massage relieve my pain without medication. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product with multiples of levels
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for back pain management. It is a quality device that is very effective. I had bought another TENS unit from another manufacturer and it doesn't even compare to this device. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the device. However, I found it difficult to use on my lower back until I found some pin to snap adapters. Might be a good idea to offer both.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyMo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Great for mobile muscle recovery. This is the second IReliev product I have purchased and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Greatly reduces recovery time!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my son after a hamstring injury and greatly Reduced recovery time
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: works well and very potable, but the battery doesn't last .
customer_reviews.author: Danny chia

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: Product really works. Wife had two shoulder surgeries within a year and the device has greatly helped in her on-going recovery. Also decide to buy the device for myself based on her assessment of the effectiveness. Outstanding customer service as well at iReliev. Can't go wrong with a great product and service to match. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M.

customer_reviews.title: It helps 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I liked that help relieve some pain for my daughter who has fibromyalgia. It makes things easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go. Packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, traveling case. this is easy to use and the pads last time after time. Effective for lower back pain .
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I do like it. I use it for my knees and my back.
customer_reviews.author: Linou

customer_reviews.title: get off the motrin
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for reoccurring back, neck and shoulder pain. Works great and has multiple modes. Charged it once when I got it and the batteries still going like a champ. I have significantly decreased the motrin I was taking. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to come home every night and had lower back PAIN...I put this on and I have no pain! I can actually do things around the house!👍👍👍👍I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patriotgirl1

customer_reviews.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I am comparing it to the professional grade unit that my physical therapist uses on me. I am recovering from knee surgery, ALC. It is very easy to use and does help with pain relief and a little mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived in about 5 days, way before the projected date.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and use it for stiff tendons. Works very well relieving muscle tension.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Ige

customer_reviews.title: Buy and get relief.. keep the pads clean ... Get the gel too
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit difficult to learn to program it.. still learning but it a good relief it does work well
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Deceitful link
customer_reviews.text: Link to pad placement was actually a link to review product —— deceitful
customer_reviews.author: John Horton

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Work better than the $350 one. I bought from the doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, better service
customer_reviews.text: The delivery speed is fantastic, I received the machine within 1 week in China. The performance is great, EMS + TENS is enough for all kinds of pains. Will recommend to other friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tony FAN

customer_reviews.title: Large pads are easier and quicker to use
customer_reviews.text: Expensive compared to ether makes.Because it’s USA you rely on exchange rates fluctuations in price and delivery.Have not experienced another machine I wanted to buy the best, I may have
customer_reviews.author: Edmundo

customer_reviews.title: post recovery
customer_reviews.text: I got this unit to help with the post for a knee replacement. It really helps to relieve the achynejss of the distressed tissues while I'm going PT and home exercises.
customer_reviews.author: hound dog

customer_reviews.title: All around good
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself is great. The battery life holds well and charges fast. The only complaint I have is how few patches you get and the patches didn’t stick for more than a couple sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel K.

customer_reviews.title: Back pain miracle!
customer_reviews.text: I used this along with the muscle rub and I couldn’t have made it through my car accident without it!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Burton

customer_reviews.title: The Back Saver.
customer_reviews.text: Our go-to for back pain. This recently helped with a bad back strain & pinched nerve, reducing recovery time! We are getting these for family members this year as they are truly lifesavers.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The only thing so far that has helped with the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Venus M. Ganson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Achilles
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding equipment with outstanding battery life. It is improving my Achilles and plantar fasciitis pain. I am slowly starting to do some running again.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: It works for me and is fun to use. Don't need to crank it all the way up either!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wood, NZ

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as advertised
customer_reviews.text: it is the unlimited equivalent of physical therapist visits and sessions and probably with better results.
customer_reviews.author: Hady Tanissa

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that I can use this treatment while moving around.
customer_reviews.author: dkval

customer_reviews.title: doesn't even turn on
customer_reviews.text: this is the second one of these I have gotten . Charge it, and it does nothing. Doesn't even light up. Hard to imagine that if you press the on button at least the backlight would come on, but no, it doesn't. This was sent to me to replace the first one that did the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: A small size but does emit impulses to muscles/back. Be sure to read directions first. Something I don’t do. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Donakato

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I went online and did some research on machines and this is the one I decided on. Obviously not the same as a professional far more expensive unit you get at physical therapy but it's pretty great for a home unit it definitely does the job. I'm glad I bought this one. I like the illuminated screen and that it can do both TENS and EMS. I would recommend this machine to anyone who needs one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Finally some pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I use it once or twice every day and went over 2 weeks before having to charge it for the first time. I like to wear it when I am doing a task that usually hurts my back, like doing dishes or vacuuming, etc. I make it through the whole task without back pain now and without hurting after! It’s amazing. I’m so grateful to have some relief!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear3

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: First 2 channel I have had. Getting the hang of how to move around the various buttons and operate.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Physical therapist recommended
customer_reviews.text: This Unit has helped with my pain tremendously. It’s not hard to use but definitely want to read the manual. My physical therapist helped me with my settings and made sense of it all.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia McClintock

customer_reviews.title: Use TENS with caution. EMS massage provides comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Caution: In my opinion, you must be very careful using TENS devices. This can make neurological and fibromyalgia issues much worse. Don't over do it, start easy. The EMS (muscle massage) is better.
customer_reviews.author: franceen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor recommended this and I've been using it on and off for back pain. It has an alternating feature that works on and off giving you the feel of a real massage as well. It is everything I needed, wanted and expected. It makes a huge difference for pain management and gets me through a full day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Moira N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for muscle treatment
customer_reviews.text: Glad to be able to use a TENS unit without a trip to PT. Works great, as described. I use it for muscles with a great deal of tone and get the relaxed outcome I’m looking for. The unit plus heat is a great combo.
customer_reviews.author: TCD

customer_reviews.title: iReliev, awesome tens unit
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was ahead of schedule, the company sent me updates and kept me informed, wife loves the new unit, and the power it delivers. Easy set-up with instructions and care manuals to understand. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: worked well for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: my husband injured his back recently and we wanted something to relieve pain besides prescription drugs. he used the TENS unit through the day and night to find relief in order to rest and recuperate. the TENS unit provides the same type of stimulation that i have experienced from a physical therapist office.
customer_reviews.author: plb

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: This little unit packs a punch for pain relief. We have reduced pain medication significantly. We really like that it is rechargeable. We can wear it wherever we go.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight, easy to use and gives me excellent arthritic joint and muscle pain relief. This has many different mode settings to use so you can achieve the exact relief you need.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Im very pleased with this unit!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the different modes of the unit that is available. It is very soothing, relaxing and ease very tense muscles! Someone such as me with shoulder, neck and upper back problems this unit does wonders! Thank you for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first but I have to say, it does give temporary relief
customer_reviews.author: TGH

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, can really feel the current. Very good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: James Yarberry

product_meta.title: TENS Unit + EMS Muscle Stimulator by iReliev: Comes with 14 Therapy Modes, Premium Pain Relief and Recovery System, Rechargeable, Large Back Lit Display, Large and Small Electrode Pads
feature_bullets: Has 8 TENS (Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation) Modes: For pain relief and arthritis. FDA Cleared.
Has 6 EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) Modes: For muscle conditioning, strength, endurance, exercise warm up and muscle recovery. FDA Cleared.
The device is also compact enough, making it easy to carry, wear on your hip or just have in your pocket with a sleek and modern design in white and blue back lit display.

The large digital display makes it easy to select a, program, mode, and pulse setting. Easily view the program you are on with description of Therapy Mode. High output prescription grade output. Avoid the hassle of insurance billing with this RX to OTC 2 in 1 TENS + EMS Unit.

Includes lead wires, (4) 2″ x 2″ and (2) 3.5″ x 5″ self-adhesive reusable electrodes, rechargeable lithium ion battery, USB/ AC adapter, clear belt clip holder, tote bag, quick start guide, and instruction manual.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
